titleStmt.title: A new yeres gyfte wherein is taught the knowledge of our selfe and the feare of God. Worthy to be geuen and thankefullye receyued of al Christen men. Imprynted at London bi Robert Crowley dwellinge in Elie rentes in Holburn. The yere of oure Lord. M.D.xlix. the laste daye of December. Autore eodem Roberto Croleo cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
titleStmt.author: Crowley, Robert, 1518?-1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Grafton for Robert Crowley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
